flawed_nl_solution:
50 x 60/100 = <<50*60/100=30>>30 people support the first team.
50 x 34/100 = <<50*34/100=2500/17>>2500/17 people support the second team.
So, a total of 30 + 2500/17 = <<30+2500/17=3010/17>>3010/17 people supported the first and second teams.
Thus, 50 - 3010/17 = <<50-3010/17=-2160/17>>-2160/17 people did not support either team.
#### -2160/17

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 17, not 2500/17. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
